resources.string: AnimalMagnetism
I value my friends and family above all else.
Road trips are the best!
I can eat just about anything when I\'m hungry.
My friends and family are everything to me.
I\'m loyal, but only for a select few.
I\'m lazy, but I do it with style.
I\'m condescending in a loving way.
My loyalty can be bought with the right bribes.
Every now and then, I go completely nuts.
I\'m pretty street smart.
I\'m a free spirit.
I\'m an amazing swimmer.
Teamwork is very important when tackling big issues.
I\'m a bit of a hedonist.
Nothing is more important than freedom.
I\'m not afraid of heights
I pretty much go wherever I want.
I\'m a responsible parent or partner.
It\'s better to work smarter, not harder.
I\'m generally a morning person.
Motivation comes and goes.
I\'m kind of a loner.
It takes time to earn trust.
I\'m often misunderstood.
I don\'t express my feelings very well, but they are there.
You\'re a Doggo! You are loyal, trustworthy and above all: Everyone\'s best friend.
Dog
Cat
You are kitty! You are a bit selfish and lazy, but you have other qualities that endear you to others.
Dolphin
You are a dolphin. You are free spirited and a social ace. You understand that experiences are more valuable than material things.
Bird
You are a bird. Free and intelligent, you figure things out in the world around you. Puzzles and philosophies are no problem for you.
Reptile
You are a reptile. You\'re smart, but a bit cold and you aren\'t always socially comfortable. Your independance takes you farther than those around you.
